column1: Coronavirus testing is available in Daventry and Wellingborough this weekend by appointment only. If you have coronavirus symptoms, follow the link to book online – and watch this video so you know what to expect! https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/testing-for-coronavirus/ask-for-a-test-to-check-if-you-have-coronavirus/
Promote awareness but please don’t scaremonger for headlines #Coronavirus
